content: Researchers have developed an AI system that can detect early signs of Parkinson's disease from brain scans up to 17 years before clinical diagnosis. This breakthrough could lead to earlier interventions and improved patient outcomes.

Microsoft has unveiled its AI-powered GitHub Copilot, an assistant that helps developers write better code by providing intelligent suggestions and auto-completing code snippets. This innovative tool could boost productivity and accelerate software development.

Apple unveils Vision Pro, its first mixed reality headset. Combining augmented and virtual reality, the $3,499 device offers immersive experiences with high-res displays and advanced hand/eye tracking. Set to launch in 2024, it aims to pioneer spatial computing.

Unusual activity alert 🚨 $INTC surging +14.9% on monster volume as $NVDA and $TSLA cool off. Tech titans $AAPL $MSFT $GOOGL $AMZN $META feeling the heat in this volatile session. Broader market $SPY down -1.1%. What's driving these wild swings? 🧐 #FinTwit #Trading

🚨 Unusual activity in $INTC - Volume soars 611% to 147M shares as price jumps 15% amid semiconductor resurgence. $NVDA volume also spikes to 132M. $ADBE down 13% on soft guidance. Eyes on $TSLA after 5% drop. What's your take on today's #fintwit volatility? #trading

🌐 New anti-immigration rhetoric is gaining traction, but could hurt economies by limiting labor supply & consumer demand. GDP growth may slow if skilled workers are turned away. #Economy #Markets #GlobalTrade

Economic fundamentals remain solid, but policies restricting talent

GoodRx stock plunges to yearly low of $4.09 amid challenging healthcare market conditions. A bellwether for consumer spending, its decline reflects tighter wallets & broader economic headwinds. 💊📉 #Markets #Economy #HealthcareSpending.

Trump's 25% auto tariffs are now in effect, raising costs for consumers and automakers. Trade wars risk dragging on economic growth if tensions escalate. 📉 Core inflation remains subdued at 2.1% despite tight labor market. #Economy #GlobalTrade #Markets.

Argentina's economic turmoil intensifies as Milei proposes dollarization as a solution, making an IMF bailout more likely. Inflation hit 115% in May, reserves dwindled to $25B, and peso plunged 20% against USD. 💸🇦🇷 #EconomicCrisis #EmergingMarkets #FiscalPolicy.

iCAD, a leading healthcare technology firm, bolsters its executive team with a new chief commercial officer. This strategic hire signals the company's commitment to driving growth in the dynamic healthcare market. 💪 #Healthcare #Leadership #BusinessExpansion.

Breaking: Major tech giants $GOOGL 🔺2.37%, $NFLX 🔻0.31%, and $COST 🔺1.66% see unusual activity. Alphabet ($GOOGL) surges on strong ad revenue, while Netflix ($NFLX) dips despite subscriber growth. Costco ($COST) rallies as shoppers flock to its wholesale model. 💰 #Fin.
